description: Alteration of roof from hip to gable (involving conversion of roof space to habitable use), rear roof extension; installation of two roof lights to front elevation and single storey rear extension.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plan: EBA/03 (August 2015) and EBA/04 (August 2015).  Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the existing materials. 	 Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings in accordance with the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies LV 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1 (g), 1.2 (f) and 3.8 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan Consolidated (2015). | No part of the roof of the single storey rear extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.  Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties and the visual appearance of the area, in accordance with the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies LV 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1 (g) and 2.10 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan Consolidated (2015).
